```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(gtsummary)
```

## no theme

```{r}
tbl <- 
  trial %>%
  select(age, trt) %>%
  tbl_summary(missing = "no", 
              by = trt) %>%
  add_overall() %>%
  add_difference()
tbl %>% as_gt()
```

## compact

```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact()
tbl %>% as_gt()
reset_gtsummary_theme()
```

## medium

```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact(gt_font_size = "medium")
tbl %>% as_gt() 
reset_gtsummary_theme()
```

## 30

```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact(gt_font_size = "30px")
tbl %>% as_gt()
reset_gtsummary_theme()
```

## small (which should be the same as the default in compact)
```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact(gt_font_size = "small")
tbl %>% as_gt() 
reset_gtsummary_theme()
```

## 13 (which should be the same as the default in compact)
```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact(gt_font_size = "13px")
tbl %>% as_gt() 
reset_gtsummary_theme()
```
